caption.center: WAYNE BISSO, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for the Nineteenth Judicial Circuit, St. Lucie County; Burton C. Conner, Judge; L.T. Case No. 562005CF001314B.
opinion.attorneys:
Carey Haughwout, Public Defender, and Elisabeth Porter, Assistant Public Defender, West Palm Beach, for appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Laura Fisher Zibura, Assistant Attorney General, West Palm Beach, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
POLEN, KLEIN and STEVENSON, JJ., concur.
Not final until disposition of timely filed motion for rehearing.
